item.description:
Salem Lions will be hosting a 90 Minute Spooky Walking tour featuring stops at Salem Historic and/or haunted sites. Tales of Mayhem and Magic will be narrated and led by the famous William Sano better known as "Bill" local historian of Salem. Last walking tour was a blast, I promised I would list the next one as a meet up.

The Doantion amount is $12.00 per person, collected at the start of the tour. All proceeds will benefit Salem Lions Charities.

So come out and lets have a spooky Saturday night and meet some

new people, and laughs.

Please bring a jacket it gets chilly at night walking.....

The Street is Charter Street we will be meeting at the Cemetary on :)
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my Picture and my cell is 617-680-5768
item.name: Salem So Spooky Walking Tour
